jobDescription: Hagerty, the leading provider of classic car insurance, valuation tools and roadside service for people who love cars, has a Temporary Mail Processing position available. We are seeking an individual who is motivated, organized, accurate and detail oriented to work in our fast-paced Mail Processing Center in our Headquarters in Traverse City, Michigan. Responsibilities:Generate printing of daily outgoing mail.Fold and insert outgoing customer correspondence.Monitor workflow request system.Perform closeday duties.Prepare and deliver all incoming mail and packages.Requirements:Effective and efficient use of computer applications including MS Office products.Must type a minimum of 35 wpm with 95% accuracy.Work well independently and in a team environment.Excellent communication skills.Proven customer service abilities.Ability to lift and carry 20-40 pounds. The hours for this position are Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday and Friday from 8am to 5pm; and Saturday from 8:30am-4:30pm.  Hagerty has been named a Fortune Magazine Great Place to Work. Click the link to see our Great Rated! review. http://reviews.greatplacetowork.com/hagerty  To apply for this position, please visit our career site at www.hagerty.com/hagerty-corporate/careers .EEO/AA  New Applicants
